content:
There is an error in the R5 schemas (both in the latest build and in the R5 Preview #2). The fhir-base.xsd and fhir-single.xsd define some types that have a bad name:
<xs:simpleType name="Event Or Request Resource Types-list">
<xs:complexType name="Event Or Request Resource Types">
can you make a task to fix?
There's also a problem where value[x] shows up as a name instead of valueCodeableReference
@Jean Duteau, can you cover both issues?

Lloyd McKenzie said:

There's also a problem where value[x] shows up as a name instead of valueCodeableReference

Yeah, I thought I saw that somewhere as well, but couldn't find it so didn't include it in my post.
